programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: Extreme Weather Countdown | Who Wants to Play Twister?
programme.desc: Today’s forecast: thunder, lightning, and high winds. Oh, and lots of tornadoes.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: Extreme Weather Countdown | Cold as Ice
programme.desc: Pipes freeze, snow falls, and people slip on the aftermath in today’s ice cold Extreme Weather Countdown

programme.title: Sinister Storms
programme.desc: Hailstorms, tidal surges, tornadoes, and earthquakes shake the ground and skies in a catastrophic event.

programme.title: Sinister Storms
programme.desc: Surging waters, brewing storms, icy landscapes, and cosmic phenomena bring the chaos.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: Storm Hunters | Fires of Fort McMurray
programme.desc: Flames Fill the sky. An entire city flees in terror. Firefighters bravely rush in.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: Mark and Jaclyn make their annual trek to Tornado Alley and this time they are looking for more than severe thunderstorms and tornadoes. They also want answers as to whether Climate Change is causing changes to Tornado Alley.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: Adventurer George Kourounis’ patience is tested as he encounters deadly wildlife and challenging elements while preparing to descend into Marum Volcano in the South Pacific.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: Mark hikes up Mount Washington, New Hampshire, the highest peak in the Northeastern US and battles one of the most dangerous mountains in the world at its peak intensity.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.desc: Today, cruise ships tilt, houses succumb to blizzards, and wind stops people in their tracks.

programme.sub-title: Extreme Weather Countdown | The Eye of the Storm
programme.desc: Lightning strikes, clouds roll, and rainbows fill the sky in this stormy Extreme Weather Countdown.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: Extreme Weather Countdown | Whichever Way the Wind Blows
programme.desc: Today's countdown will give you a front row seat to weather phenomena from around the globe!

programme.title: Storm Hunters

programme.desc: Every weather event you can imagine is making it impossible for people- and cars- to stay on their feet!
